text_block_list.text: After the 'Satsuki Sho' and heading towards the 'Japanese Derby', days continued with unusually solid training being carried out.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huff, ha, haa~...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So tough~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yah, my form was all messed up in the latter half. I guess my stamina is totally lacking after all.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Can we increase stamina-based training? Even in self-training, I gotta run more...
Saying that, the memo pad spread out had training menus densely written all over it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Nah, everyone does about this much. I gotta work even harder, if anything.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The 'Japanese Derby' is a once-in-a-lifetime event. I want to perfect it!
One such day, multiple reporters had come to interview Mihono Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san, there's been a lot lately. She's getting sharper and sharper, so that makes sense.

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses reporter
text_block_list.text: Today, I absolutely have to get a good story from Bourbon-san...

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses reporter
text_block_list.text: ...I wish I could write an interesting article too. But this time will surely... Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...? What's going on? Reporters have it tough too, huh?

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses reporter
text_block_list.text: I, I see...! There's an Umamusume you're concerned about for the 'Japanese Derby'!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Yes. She's usually a reserved and quiet type, but I caught a 'fierceness' in the 'Satsuki Sho'.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Since then, her rapid growth has been confirmed from her training appearances as well.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: In other words, I judge she could become a 'strong rival' in the 'Japanese Derby'.

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses reporter
text_block_list.text: Th-thank you! Um, and then...!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me! What's that Umamusume's name?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: It's 'Rice Shower'.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No way... I can't believe Bourbon-san was also conscious of Rice-san...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, come to think of it, I actually interviewed Rice-san the other day!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes, I happened to run into Rice-san while she was out for a walk, but—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, Rice-san! What a coincidence~. Good luck in the next Derby!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-you too...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Wait, isn't the sole of your shoe coming off? Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, you're right...! Maybe I ran too much, I need to change them.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Until your shoes are worn out! That's amazing, you're working so hard...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Come to think of it, in the 'Satsuki Sho' too, your fighting spirit was practically buzzing through! The race was incredible too—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: R-really? I still feel like I can't catch up...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Catch up... Oh, you mean Bourbon-san?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh!? How did you know about that...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, actually, in the underground passage at the 'Satsuki Sho'—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-you saw me... I see...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Sorry for peeking! But your feelings, Rice-san, were so passionate, it made me want to cheer you on!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And I understand that feeling of admiration for Bourbon-san too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: When Bourbon-san runs, the stands light up~! It's so cool!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: R-really...!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon-san is strong, cool, and can make everyone smile so much... she's an amazing Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So, someday, someday... I want to be an Umamusume like Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I... I hope I can become like that...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I happened to overhear that conversation~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I think it's wonderful how Bourbon-san can inspire such feelings, and how Rice-san can grow stronger because of Bourbon-san's existence~!

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: Um, about that story...

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, could we hear more details about that story!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa!? O-of course!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: I never imagined she held such feelings...! This could make for an eye-catching article!

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: That's right, it might be good to ask a pundit about who will win.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm... 'Who will'?

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Actually, we were told from above that the other girls can be treated as supporting characters... Because the article will be read for Mihono Bourbon's sake.
It seems that in their focus on work, they haven't realized that the Umamusume in front of them is also a runner in the 'Japanese Derby'.
choice_data_list: (As her trainer, I can't stay silent--)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wait a minute, please!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I understand that Bourbon-san and Rice-san's greatness might overshadow the other runners!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And I get that what's being asked for is that too--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, you know, the possibility of another girl winning isn't zero at all, right?

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: ...? Huh, ah!! Matikanetannhauser! -san...!

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: S-s-sorry! I didn't notice...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, it's fine! Because I'm plain and ordinary! I'm not special at all!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But, but but...
The talk about the possibility of winning is a different matter.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because, I don't want anything but first place either!
Her gentle demeanor was the same as usual, but her words carried a definite heat.
A few hours later. The round-glasses reporter was spotted looking somewhat moved.

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses reporter
text_block_list.text: ...I see, even if it's not 'special'...

text_block_list.name: Round-glasses reporter
text_block_list.text:
Even if it's not 'special,' 'wanting to win'...
That's fine...
The 'Japanese Derby' is just around the corner.
